1.title: Episode #1.1
1.plot: After their first murder attempt goes awry, Rabih guides Ahmad, Nermine, and Marc on a little tour through the neighborhood of Al Saout where they meet its eccentric characters, and learn about the quality of life there.

2.title: Episode #1.2
2.plot: Rabih sets up his new lair at a garage along with the crew, and they receive an unwelcome and suspicious visit. The crew then heads out to the streets of Beirut looking for a new kill while they discuss and philosophise Rabih as a killer.

3.title: Episode #1.3
3.plot: Ahmad and Nermine proceed to stylize Rabih's look as the serial killer they want him to be, and they stumble upon their next victim. They set out to hunt her down, but things go wrong and Rabih's short temper blows in everyone's faces.

4.title: Episode #1.4
4.plot: The crew steals a car that grants them access to Thea's apartment and helps them finish off her murder. Rabih and Ahmad bust into the apartment while Nermine keeps an eye on any intruders, and the hunt begins.

5.title: Episode #1.5
5.plot: The crew steals a car that grants them access to Thea's apartment and helps them finish off her murder. Rabih and Ahmad bust into the apartment while Nermine keeps an eye on any intruders, and the hunt begins. After shambolically butchering an innocent cab driver, the crew decide to attend a Mashrou' Leila concert to scavenge for their next victim. They decide to kill a drug dealer named Kemo, but when the killing is up to Rabih, does anything really pan out as planned?

imdb.plot outline: Rabih TV is a dark comedy created by Lebanese director Mohamed A. Berro and written by Fuad Halwani. Set in the city of Beirut, it follows a fictional TV show, driven by Ahmad, a director fixed on turning his childhood friend, Rabih, into a serial killer. With the help of Marc, a young cameraman seeking "new experiences", and Nermine, a washed up yet seasoned producer, they start filming and documenting Rabih's murders. Aside from the project's unorthodox nature, the four will be obliged to tolerate one another in order to maintain anonymity and find their way to fame.
imdb.title: Rabih TV
plot: _Rabih TV_ (qv) is a dark comedy created by Lebanese director Mohamed A. Berro and written by Fuad Halwani. Set in the city of Beirut, it follows a fictional TV show, driven by Ahmad, a director fixed on turning his childhood friend, Rabih, into a serial killer. With the help of Marc, a young cameraman seeking "new experiences", and Nermine, a washed up yet seasoned producer, they start filming and documenting Rabih's murders. Aside from the project's unorthodox nature, the four will be obliged to tolerate one another in order to maintain anonymity and find their way to fame.
